data.name: 010_Option_2
data.value: Nevermind.

data.name: 010_Option_1
data.value: Let's talk.

data.name: 010_Option_0
data.value: I'd like to craft an item.
Don't worry about her, Dust. Altitude sickness. Drives some creatures crazy.
Fidget was pretty crazy before. Maybe we should be on our way.
Uh, Fidget, I don't think that'd help-
Yeah, I hear what you're saying. I wish it was more accessible - we'd get more business, I'm sure of it. But it's not like we can just pick it up and move it.
You know! Smart, mutant rats! With MAGIC!
Sounds like this forge has a lot of history behind it, then. Even so...
I'll bet if you had an army of trained rats, you could move this place no problem!
It was built during the Battle of Archers' Pass, many hundreds of years ago. The archers were holding off their enemies from way up here, but they needed a forge to replenish their arrows.
Location, location, location.
Your forge is pretty far off the beaten path, Haley. Why set up shop so far outside Aurora?
So they built one right where they stood! It helped them take Archers' Pass, and from here, they were able to liberate the whole valley.
This forge is actually quite ancient! My father's father's father's father inherited it from his mother's grandfather on her father's side.
Now Dust, this doesn't mean I don't want you coming up to visit me in person. But at least I can keep an eye on you and help you out whenever you need me.
From beyoooond the graaaaave!
AAH! DEMON BLACKSMITH! That's the worst kind of blacksmith!
Hello? Hello? Can you hear me?
Haley? Is that you? Where are you calling from?
That's great! Now if you ever need to craft an item, you can do it directly from your Inventory.
Oh, would you calm down? I'm at home with Matti. I see you found my dad's lost receiver!
Yeah, and it seems to be working.
Sure, Haley. I really appreciate the help.

If I remember correctly, one of my dad's customers dropped one somewhere in Abadis Forest. If you were to find it, I could craft your items and send them to you through the receiver whenever you wanted!
Dad normally gives his customers a Blue Resonance Gem, so check for blue resonance gates in Abadis Forest.
Hmm. Well, my dad DID have these little receiver things he'd give to his regular customers to transport goods back and forth.
Unfortunately I don't have any of them to give you. Let me think...
Just inside the door is a teleporter that'll take you right up here! Makes return trips a lot easier, so you can come and visit any time you like.
And just because I like you, I'll give you a Blue Resonance Gem. Don't know if you caught it on your way up, but there's a big blue door at the foot of Archers' Pass that this'll open.
I'll be honest, even with a shortcut at the foot of the Pass I'm not sure I'll be able to make it up here too often...
Thanks, Haley.
Don't mind him. I see you've got a blueprint there, mind if I take a look?
Well... this doesn't look too hard. Tell you what, if you can find me the materials for it, I'll craft this item for you.
Nice to meet you. I'm Haley, and this is my brother, Matti.
*grumbles*
Ah! Easy there, chief!
Whoa! Ah... hello there!
Everyone, calm down, please! So! You were the ones making all that noise up there!
So, what brings you two this far outside Aurora? I'm assuming that's where you're from?
Grrr...
Not intentionally. By the way, do you know you have blombs in the attic?
I'm Dust, and this is my companion, Fidget. We're here to deliver these materials on Avgustin's behalf.
Oh those? They don't bother us, and they tend to keep the other monsters away. If I knew we were having company, I'd have cleared them out myself. Sorry about that, I guess.
So, let's talk.
Aw, maybe next time then.
Need anything else?
Ah, my favorite customer! What can I do for you?
Thanks, Dust. Don't be long coming back!
Well, hope that answers your question!
Not really, but-
Let it go, Dust. Just let it go.
I really can't say, Dust. Matti, do you have anything to say?
Grrr...
I notice it's only you and Matti up here in the Pass. Is it just you two?
Sounds like he's always pretty busy.

Not all the time, no. My father still runs the forge, but he's usually away on business. Right now he's somewhere across the sea hunting down new minerals and ores. He's always trying to make better weapons and armor.
I meant to ask before... does Matti have a problem with me?
Yeah, but I get along fine by myself. And Matti, too, of course.
Well, it's just... he seems to grumble a lot around me.
What!?
I can attest to that! Lots of grumbling.
In a way, I guess. My father said I could be whatever I wanted, but when you grow up alongside a world-famous blacksmith your options are fairly limited.
So business is good?
So, is blacksmithing the official family trade, then?
Not that I mind, though! It's nice to have skills that are in demand these days. Everybody always needs something forged, whether it's amulets or armor.
It's... well, it's been better. Still, we make enough to keep things going, and that's the important thing.

data.name: 015_Option_2
data.value: Why live in Archers' Pass?

data.name: 015_Option_0
data.value: Is Matti your only family?

data.name: 015_Option_1
data.value: How long have you been a blacksmith?
